name: Yuck 'n' Yum!
description:
Your boss has recently installed a food-making machine in the bakery, but something's wrong. It sometimes produces trash! Luckily,  you have your handy rotating platform thing to help you. Sort the trash from the food, and don't get fired!

Controls:
Right and Left arrow keys

Credits:
kaankaraca - Game design and programming (kaankaraca.itch.io/)
GloriousToast - Art and programming (glorious-toast.itch.io/)
ShadyLeeGamer - Sound design and programming (shadyleegamer.itch.io/)
